data.author: Lee Atwater
data.quote: My childhood, adolescence and high school days are unusually important. If there has ever been a time that I developed a uniqueness and sense of humor and the ability to organize, it was then. In those early days, I developed the skills that gave me a certain degree of success in American politics.

data.author: Bertolt Brecht
data.quote: Why be a man when you can be a success?

data.author: Christopher Lasch
data.quote: Nothing succeeds like the appearance of success.

data.author: Pierce Brosnan
data.quote: I thought 'Moulin Rouge' was inspirational, and 'Jesus Christ Superstar' I loved.

data.author: Skylar Grey
data.quote: Your personal life, your professional life, and your creative life are all intertwined. I went through a few very difficult years where I felt like a failure. But it was actually really important for me to go through that. Struggle, for me, is the most inspirational thing in the world at the end of the day - as long as you treat it that way.

data.author: Dennis C. Blair
data.quote: The leaders who we admire who have been able to bring great change in the past - Gandhi, Martin Luther King, Nelson Mandela - they're all inspirational religious leaders and smart tacticians. It would be nice to find the Muslim Gandhi, wouldn't it?

data.author: Euripides
data.quote: Much effort, much prosperity.

data.author: Bobby Locke
data.quote: The real success in golf lies in turning three shots into two.

data.author: Erma Bombeck
data.quote: Don't confuse fame with success. Madonna is one; Helen Keller is the other.

data.author: Nicolaus Copernicus
data.quote: Of all things visible, the highest is the heaven of the fixed stars.

data.author: Hassanal Bolkiah
data.quote: Future peace, prosperity and confidence depend not just on ourselves but on the success of all nations. Hence, we are all partners, no matter what our backgrounds, cultures, faiths and histories.

data.author: Bo Bennett
data.quote: A rejection is nothing more than a necessary step in the pursuit of success.

data.author: Christa McAuliffe
data.quote: Reach for it. Push yourself as far as you can.

data.author: Pablo Picasso
data.quote: Our goals can only be reached through a vehicle of a plan, in which we must fervently believe, and upon which we must vigorously act. There is no other route to success.

data.author: Ban Ki-moon
data.quote: Like the United Nations, there is something inspirational about New York as a great melting pot of different cultures and traditions. And if this is the city that never sleeps, the United Nations works tirelessly, around the clock around the world.

data.author: Jennifer Lopez
data.quote: Once you have a lot of success, you become a target in many ways.

data.author: Woodrow Wilson
data.quote: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.

data.author: Ludwig Quidde
data.quote: Every success in limiting armaments is a sign that the will to achieve mutual understanding exists, and every such success thus supports the fight for international law and order.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.

data.author: Roger Babson
data.quote: Keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final.
